casebody.data:
Hilliard SANDERS, Appellant, v. Edwin B. SWOPE, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Alcatraz, California, Appellee. No. 12171. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Aug. 29, 1949. Rehearing Denied Oct. 3, 1949. James J. Durney and George F. Clinton, San Francisco, Cal., for appellant. Frank J. Hennessy, U. S. Atty, Joseph Karesh, Asst. U. S. Atty, San Francisco, Cal., for appellee.

Before GARDNER* and HEADY, Circuit Judges and YANKWJCII, District Judge.

Chief Judge, United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit, designated to sit in this courr.

 PER CURTAM.

The judgment is affirmed on the authority of Sanders v. Johnston, 9 Cir., 159 F.2d 74 and Numer v. Miller, 9 Cir., 165 F.2d 986.
